content.raw:
Thanks. I will try your suggestion and see how it works.

By the way, a few minutes ago I tried installing now in a Ubuntu 12.04 system (64 bits, ROS Fuerte, gcc 4.6) and I got [the same error](http://pastebin.com/ETRdtcw8). While I did not modify the DRCSim source code, I had to add a library to a Gazebo CMakeLists.txt file to make it compile:

gazebo/src/gazebo/common/CMakeListst.txt : I Added pthread to the target_link_libraries to fix linking errors.

Other than that, I did not modify the code. Gazebo works fine, while I get the error mentioned above while trying to install DRCSim

Thanks for all your help
content.html:
Thanks. I will try your suggestion and see how it works.

By the way, a few minutes ago I tried installing now in a Ubuntu 12.04 system (64 bits, ROS Fuerte, gcc 4.6) and I got the same error. While I did not modify the DRCSim source code, I had to add a library to a Gazebo CMakeLists.txt file to make it compile:

gazebo/src/gazebo/common/CMakeListst.txt : I Added pthread to the target_link_libraries to fix linking errors.

Other than that, I did not modify the code. Gazebo works fine, while I get the error mentioned above while trying to install DRCSim

Thanks for all your help
